title: LG Rollable Phone, Apple Silicon Event, & How We Survived Techtober
description:
In this week's episode, we dissect LG's new concept rollable phone patent and preview Apple's upcoming Silicon event. Lastly, we hit up the Twitter mailbag to answer questions from you, our listeners, about anything we may have missed during our busy season. It's a fruitless attempt at playing catch-up with your plethora of questions. Happy Technovember!

Links:
https://twitter.com/wvfrm  
https://twitter.com/mkbhd  
https://twitter.com/andymanganelli  
https://www.instagram.com/wvfrmpodcast/
